greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of e.g.f.: exp(Sum_{j=1..k+1} binomial(k,j-1)*x^j/j).
formula: A(0,k) = 1 and A(n,k) = (n-1)! * Sum_{j=1..min(k+1,n)} binomial(k,j-1)*A(n-j,k)/(n-j)! for n > 0.
mathematica: Table[A[n-k, k], {n, 0, 11}, {k, n, 0, -1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 03 2017 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Oct 21 2017
